6. Select **CREATE NEW** to create a new communication setting profile.

> üí° **Tip:**  
> You can also select or edit existing profiles.

!Communication Setting Menu

7. Adjust **IP ADDRESS SETTING**.
   - Select **AUTO** to use an IP address assigned by the network.
   - Select **MANUAL** to choose the IP address manually as described in ‚ÄúConnecting Using an IP Address‚Äù (page 265).

!IP Address Setting

8. Select **NEXT** to proceed after adjusting IP address settings.

!Next Option

9. Name the communication setting profile.

!Naming Communication Setting

10. Save the connection setting profile. Press **MENU/OK**.

!Save Connection Setting
